attributes.action: Call a General Election and require every serving MP to stand down
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the light of the current expenses scandal.  We the undersigned ask that we be given the right to choose new representation.  We believe that all of the current political class are discredited and they should stand down

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
